summary: A configuration container that holds all architectural and training hyperparameters for a Chinese CLIP text encoder, allowing the model to be built with specified vocabulary size, hidden dimensions, transformer depth, attention settings, dropout rates, position embedding types, and initialization details.
business_intent: Facilitate the creation and customization of Chinese CLIP text models for applications such as cross‑modal retrieval, image‑text matching, and other multilingual multimodal AI services by providing a standardized, reproducible setup of model parameters.
